Text.Page: The only good thing about these massive argon machines is that they're not sentient. Take out their controllers and they're useless—won't do a blasted thing.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I sense a mission."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Three dread factors control the navashad—that giant tentacled monstrosity. Kill them and recover the control mechanism.

I'll ready what troops I can. With luck, we can take the argons by surprise.

The navashad lies dormant? Yes!

This is what we've needed. The navashad knocks our transports out of the sky and crushes our siege engines. You've aided us immensely.

I'll get the controller to our best scientists. We'll unlock its mysteries.
